TopicTitle: Problems getting Real Scale Solar System working with Realism Overhaul...

Articles.Content:
I've managed to get the mods loaded up, but the part sizes are all messed up, some are bigger while others are not and Tweakscale doesn't really fix the problem since the part sizes dont match up.

 

Any ideas on what could be going wrong or how I could fix this?

 

 

Edited July 11, 2017 by kerbonaut101
